page.title: 15PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: There are two bus companies operating in the area. The main company is The LIncolnshire Roadcar Service. They operate many services in the county. Our area lies on the Lincoln to Newark route and so services between the two towns is fairly regular. They also operate a service that just comes to Hykeham, although it does not go round the village. The other company that serves our area is The Silver Dawn Company. They operate a service that runs from Brant Road (Lincoln) to the Birchwood Housing Estate (Lincoln). The service comes along the road from Waddington across the bridge and then along Chapel Lane onto Lincoln Road. The services are quite cheap (30p to Lincoln) but they only run at the rate of one an hour.
